org.magicdgs.readtools.utils.read.stats

Interface PairEndReadStatFunction<S,T>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - statistic value.
    T - temporary value (might be the same or different).
    All Superinterfaces:
    StatFunction<S,scala.Tuple2<org.broadinstitute.hellbender.utils.read.GATKRead,org.broadinstitute.hellbender.utils.read.GATKRead>>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PairIntegerTagCounter, PairIntegerTagListCounter

    public interface PairEndReadStatFunction<S,T>
extends StatFunction<S,scala.Tuple2<org.broadinstitute.hellbender.utils.read.GATKRead,org.broadinstitute.hellbender.utils.read.GATKRead>>
    Function for pair-end reads (GATKRead) that can be computed in two steps.

    The main function is compute(Tuple2), which define was is the expected behavior.

    This class could be used for iteration over record where the read-pairs are separated. In that case, it allows to cache needed information in a temporary object of type T, which can be used when the next read is found. To maintain the same behavior as te main function compute(Tuple2), the following methods should be called:

    1. computeIntermediateFirst(GATKRead) on the first pair (Tuple2._1()
    2. computeIntermediateSecond(GATKRead) on the second pair (Tuple2._2()
    3. mergePairValues(Object, Object) on returned objects.

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      default S compute(scala.Tuple2<org.broadinstitute.hellbender.utils.read.GATKRead,org.broadinstitute.hellbender.utils.read.GATKRead> pair)

      Apply the function to the first read of the pair.

      Applies the function to the second read of the pair.
      S mergePairValues(T first, T second)

      • Methods inherited from interface org.magicdgs.readtools.utils.read.stats.StatFunction

    • Method Detail

      • compute

        default S compute(scala.Tuple2<org.broadinstitute.hellbender.utils.read.GATKRead,org.broadinstitute.hellbender.utils.read.GATKRead> pair)
        Applies the function to both read pairs.

        This is the main method for the PairEndReadStatFunction and should implement the following pseudo-code (default implementation):

        1. computeIntermediateFirst(GATKRead) on the first pair (Tuple2._1()
        2. computeIntermediateSecond(GATKRead) on the second pair (Tuple2._2()
        3. mergePairValues(Object, Object) on returned objects.

        Implementations are not enforced to validate that reads in the Tuple2<GATKRead, GATKRead> pair are valid pairs. That means that calling on non-pairs might return a result as well.

        Specified by:
        compute in interface StatFunction<S,scala.Tuple2<org.broadinstitute.hellbender.utils.read.GATKRead,org.broadinstitute.hellbender.utils.read.GATKRead>>
        Parameters:
        pair - the record to compute the statistic from.
        Returns:
        the statistic applied to the pair of reads.

      • computeIntermediateFirst

        T computeIntermediateFirst(org.broadinstitute.hellbender.utils.read.GATKRead read)
        Apply the function to the first read of the pair.
        Parameters:
        read - first read of the pair.
        Returns:
        the temporary value for the statistic. This might not be used for consumption.

      • computeIntermediateSecond

        default T computeIntermediateSecond(org.broadinstitute.hellbender.utils.read.GATKRead read)
        Applies the function to the second read of the pair.

        Default implementation returns the result of computeIntermediateFirst(GATKRead)}.

        Parameters:
        read - second read of the pair.
        Returns:
        the temporary value for the statistic. This might not be used for consumption.

      • mergePairValues

        S mergePairValues(T first,
                  T second)
        Merges the values coming from both read pairs.
        Parameters:
        first - the value from the first read of the pair.
        second - the value for the second read of the pair.
        Returns:
        the merged value.
